subtask1.ensemble: No, only a single model was used for the turn detection

subtask2.ensemble: No, only a single model was used for the knowledge selection
subtask2.pretrained: We used microsoft/deberta-v3-base to build the model. Also for augmentation we did back translation for augmentation, and used Translation models from huggingface opus-mt-{src}-{tgt} models. We used, ch,da,sp,de,ben,fi,hu,hi,ko,tl translation model
subtask2.desc: We did back translation for augmentation and also did noise injection for more robust training.

subtask3.ensemble: No, only a single model was used for the response generation
